fields.label: aln_min_score
fields.doc: A signed integer that specifies a minimum acceptable alignment score to report the baseline for MAPQ. When using local alignments (global is 0), aln-min-score is computed by the host software as 22 * match-score. When using global alignments (global is 1), aln-min-score is set to -1000000. Host software computation can be overridden by setting aln-min-score in configuration file.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/aln_min_score

fields.label: clip_pe_overhang
fields.doc: When nonzero, clips 3' read ends overhanging their mate's 5' ends as aligned. Set 1 to soft-clip overhang, 2 to hard-clip.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/clip_pe_overhang

fields.label: dedup_min_qual
fields.doc: Specifies a minimum base quality for calculating read quality metric for deduplication.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/dedup_min_qual

fields.label: en_alt_hap_aln
fields.doc: Allows haplotype alignments to be output as supplementary.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/en_alt_hap_aln

fields.label: en_chimeric_aln
fields.doc: Allows chimeric alignments to be output as supplementary.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/en_chimeric_aln

fields.label: gap_ext_pen
fields.doc: Specifies the penalty for extending a gap.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/gap_ext_pen

fields.label: gap_open_pen
fields.doc: Specifies the penalty for opening a gap (ie, insertion or deletion).
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/gap_open_pen

fields.label: global
fields.doc: Controls whether alignment is end-to-end in the read. The following values represent the different alignments: 0 is local alignment (Smith-Waterman) 1 is global alignment (Needleman-Wunsch)
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/global

fields.label: hard_clip_tags
fields.doc: Flags put hard-clipped bases in XB/XQ tags: [0] primary, [1] supplementary, [2] secondary
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/hard_clip_tags

fields.label: hard_clips
fields.doc: Specifies alignments for hard clipping. The following values represent the different alignments: Bit 0 is primary Bit 1 is supplementary Bit 2 is secondary
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/hard_clips

fields.label: map_orientations
fields.doc: Constrains orientations to accept forward-only, reverse-complement only, or any alignments. The following values represent the different orientations: 0 is any 1 is forward only 2 is reverse only
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/map_orientations

fields.label: mapq_floor_1snp
fields.doc: Minimum MAPQ when the best score exceeds others by at least one SNP cost
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/mapq_floor_1snp

fields.label: mapq_max
fields.doc: Specifies ceiling on reported MAPQ. The default value is 60.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/mapq_max

fields.label: mapq_strict_sjs
fields.doc: Specific to RNA. When set to 0, a higher MAPQ value is returned, expressing confidence that the alignment is at least partially correct. When set to 1, a lower MAPQ value is returned, expressing the splice junction ambiguity.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/mapq_strict_sjs

fields.label: match_n_score
fields.doc: A signed integer that specifies the score increment for matching where a read or reference base is N.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/match_n_score

fields.label: match_score
fields.doc: Specifies the score increment for matching reference nucleotide.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/match_score

fields.label: max_rescues
fields.doc: Specifies maximum rescue alignments per read pair. The default value is 10.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/max_rescues

fields.label: min_overhang
fields.doc: Minimum overhang on each side of a splice junction
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/min_overhang

fields.label: min_score_coeff
fields.doc: Sets adjustment to aln-min-score per read base.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/min_score_coeff

fields.label: mismatch_pen
fields.doc: Defines the score penalty for a mismatch.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/mismatch_pen

fields.label: no_noncan_motifs
fields.doc:
Set to suppress individual non-canonical splice junctions.
0 = no filter, 1 = remove unless annotated, 2 = remove noncanonical motif splice junctions
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/no_noncan_motifs

fields.label: no_unclip_score
fields.doc: When set to 1, the option removes any unclipped bonus (unclip-score) contributing to an alignment from the alignment score before further processing.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/no_unclip_score

fields.label: no_unpaired
fields.doc: Determines if only properly paired alignments should be reported for paired reads.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/no_unpaired

fields.label: pe_max_penalty
fields.doc: Specifies the maximum pairing score penalty for unpaired or distant ends.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/pe_max_penalty

fields.label: pe_orientation
fields.doc: Specifies the expected paired-end orientation. The following values represent the different orientations: 0 is FR (default) 1 is RF 2 is FF
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/pe_orientation

fields.label: rescue_sigmas
fields.doc: Sets deviations from the mean read length used for rescue scan radius. The default value is 2.5.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/rescue_sigmas

fields.label: sec_aligns
fields.doc: Restricts the maximum number of secondary (suboptimal) alignments to report per read.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/sec_aligns

fields.label: sec_aligns_hard
fields.doc: If set to 1, forces the read to be unmapped when not all secondary alignments can be output.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/sec_aligns_hard

fields.label: sec_phred_delta
fields.doc: Controls which secondary alignments are emitted. Only secondary alignments within this Phred value of the primary are reported.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/sec_phred_delta

fields.label: sec_score_delta
fields.doc: Determines the pair score threshold below primary that secondary alignments are allowed.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/sec_score_delta

fields.label: supp_aligns
fields.doc: Restricts the maximum number of supplementary (chimeric) alignments to report per read.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/supp_aligns

fields.label: supp_as_sec
fields.doc: Determines if supplementary alignments should be reported with secondary flag.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/supp_as_sec

fields.label: supp_min_score_adj
fields.doc: Specifies amount to increase minimum alignment score for supplementary alignments. The score is computed by host software as 8 * match-score for DNA. The default is 0 for RNA.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/supp_min_score_adj

fields.label: unclip_score
fields.doc: Specifies the score bonus for reaching the edge of the read.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/unclip_score

fields.label: unpaired_pen
fields.doc: Specifies the penalty for unpaired alignments, using Phred scale.
fields.name: #dragen-aligner-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-aligner-options/unpaired_pen

inputs.label: alignment options input
inputs.doc: Alignment options

fields.label: ann_sj_max_indel
fields.doc: Specifies maximum indel length to expect near an annotated splice junction.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/ann_sj_max_indel

fields.label: edit chain limit
fields.doc: For edit-mode 1 or 2, the option sets maximum seed chain length in a read to qualify for seed editing.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/edit_chain_limit

fields.label: edit_mode
fields.doc: Controls when seed editing is used. The following values represent the different edit modes: 0 is no edits, 1 is chain length test, 2 is paired chain length test, 3 is full seed edits
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/edit_mode

fields.label: edit_read_len
fields.doc: For edit-mode 1 or 2, controls the read length for edit-seed-num seed editing positions.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/edit_read_len

fields.label: edit-seed-num
fields.doc: For edit-mode 1 or 2, controls the requested number of seeds per read to allow editing on.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/edit_seed_num

fields.label: map_orientations
fields.doc: Restricts the orientation of read mapping to only forward in the reference genome or only reverse-complemented. The following values represent the different orientations (paired end requires normal):0 is normal (paired-end inputs must use normal), 1 is reverse-complemented, 2 is no forward
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/map_orientations

fields.label: max_intron_bases
fields.doc: Specifies maximum intron length reported.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/max_intron_bases

fields.label: min_intron_bases
fields.doc: Specifies minimum reference deletion length reported as an intron.
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/min_intron_bases

fields.label: seed_density
fields.doc: Controls requested density of seeds from reads queried in the hash table
fields.name: #dragen-mapper-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-mapper-options/seed_density

inputs.label: alignment options input
inputs.doc: Alignment options or null

fields.label: enable rna quantification
fields.doc: Enable RNA gene expression quantification.
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/enable_rna_quantification

fields.label: rna quantification fld max
fields.doc: Fragment length distribution max for single-ended library runs. Default is 100
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/rna_quantification_fld_max

fields.label: rna quantification fld mean
fields.doc: Fragment length distribution mean for single-ended library runs. Default is 250
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/rna_quantification_fld_mean

fields.label: rna quantification fld sd
fields.doc: Fragment length distribution standard deviation for single-ended library runs. Default is 25
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/rna_quantification_fld_sd

fields.label: rna quantification gc bias
fields.doc: Use gc bias model. Default is true
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/rna_quantification_gc_bias

fields.label: rna quantification tlen min
fields.doc: Minimum transcript length to be used for coverage profiling. Default is 500
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-expression-quantification-options/rna_quantification_tlen_min

inputs.label: rna gene expression quantification options input
inputs.doc: Alignment options or null

outputs.label: rna gene expression quantification options output

fields.label: dbsnp
fields.doc: Sets the path to the variant annotation database VCF (or *.vcf.gz) file.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/dbsnp

fields.label: dn cnv vcf
fields.doc: For de novo calling, filters joint structural variant VCF from the CNV calling step. If omitted, DRAGEN skips any checks with overlapping copy number variants.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/dn_cnv_vcf

fields.label: dn input vcf
fields.doc: For de novo calling, filters joint small variant VCF from the de novo calling step.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/dn_input_vcf

fields.label: dn output vcf
fields.doc: For de novo calling, specifies the file location for writing the filtered VCF file. If not specified, the input VCF is overwritten.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/dn_output_vcf

fields.label: dn sv vcf
fields.doc: For de novo calling, filters the joint structural variant VCF file from the SV calling step. If omitted, DRAGEN skips any checks with overlapping structural variants.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/dn_sv_vcf

fields.label: enable joint genotyping
fields.doc: To enable the joint genotyping caller, set to true.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_joint_genotyping

fields.label: enable methylation calling
fields.doc: Automatically adds tags related to methylation and outputs a single BAM for methylation protocols.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_methylation_calling

fields.label: enable multi sample gvcf
fields.doc: Enables generation of a multisample gVCF file. If set to true, requires a combined gVCF file as input.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_multi_sample_gvcf

fields.label: enable variant caller
fields.doc:
Enables the DRAGEN variant caller.
This is forced to true for DNA but for RNA analysis, you will need to set this to true
in order to enable the variant caller.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_variant_caller

fields.label: enable variant deduplication
fields.doc: Enables variant deduplication. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_variant_deduplication

fields.label: enable vcf compression
fields.doc: Enables compression of VCF output files. The default value is true.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_vcf_compression

fields.label: enable vcf indexing
fields.doc: Outputs a *.tbi index file in addition to the output VCF/gVCF. The default is true.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_vcf_indexing

fields.label: enable vlrd
fields.doc: Enables Virtual Long Read Detection.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/enable_vlrd

fields.label: pedigree file
fields.doc: Specifies the path to a pedigree file that describes the familial relationships between panels (specific to joint calling). Only pedigree files that contain trios are supported.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/pedigree_file

fields.label: qc detect contamination
fields.doc:
Recommended way to run contamination detection based on GATK CalculateContamination.
Supports germline and somatic.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/qc_detect_contamination

fields.label: qc indel denovo quality threshold
fields.doc: Sets the threshold for counting and reporting de novo INDEL variants.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/qc_indel_denovo_quality_threshold

fields.label: qc snp denovo quality threshold
fields.doc: Sets the threshold for counting and reporting de novo SNP variants.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/qc_snp_denovo_quality_threshold

fields.label: rna vc enable homozygous genotype
fields.doc: Enables the generation of homozygous genotypes in the VCF output. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/rna_vc_enable_homozygous_genotype

fields.label: rna vc homozygous genotype af threshold
fields.doc: Sets the allele frequency threshold for calling homozygous genotypes. The default value is 0.85
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/rna_vc_homozygous_genotype_af_threshold

fields.label: variant
fields.doc: Specifies the path to a single gVCF file. You can use the --variant option multiple times to specify paths to multiple gVCF files. Use one file per line. Up to 500 gVCFs are supported.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/variant

fields.label: variant list
fields.doc: Specifies the path to a file containing a list of input gVCF files that need to be combined. Use one file per line.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/variant_list

fields.label: vc af call threshold
fields.doc: If the AF filter is enabled using --vc-enable-af-filter=true, the option sets the allele frequency call threshold for nuclear chromosomes to emit a call in the VCF. The default value is 0.01.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_af_call_threshold

fields.label: vc af call threshold mito
fields.doc: If the AF filter is enabled using --vc-enable-af-filter-mito=true, the option sets the allele frequency call threshold to emit a call in the VCF for mitochondrial variant calling. The default value is 0.01.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_af_call_threshold_mito

fields.label: vc af filter threshold
fields.doc: If the AF filter is enabled using --vc-enable-af-filter=true, the option sets the allele frequency filter threshold for nuclear chromosomes to mark emitted VCF calls as filtered. The default value is 0.05.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_af_filter_threshold

fields.label: vc af filter threshold mito
fields.doc: If the AF filter is enabled using --vc-enable-af-filter-mito=true, the option sets the allele frequency filter threshold to mark emitted VCF calls as filtered for mitochondrial variant calling. The default value is 0.02.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_af_filter_threshold_mito

fields.label: vc callability normal threshold
fields.doc: Specifies the normal sample coverage threshold for a site to be considered callable in the somatic callable regions report. The default is 5.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_callability_normal_threshold

fields.label: vc callability tumor threshold
fields.doc: Specifies the tumor sample coverage threshold for a site to be considered callable in the somatic callable regions report. The default is 50.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_callability_tumor_threshold

fields.label: vc clustered event penalty
fields.doc: SQ score penalty applied to phased clustered somatic events; set to 0 to disable the penalty. The default value is 4.0 for tumor-normal and 7.0 for tumor-only.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_clustered_event_penalty

fields.label: vc combine phased variants distance
fields.doc:
Specifies the maximum distance over which phased insertions, deletions, and SNVs will be combined into a complex indel.
This distance threshold will be applied to any group of phased variants that includes at least one indel.
The default is 2 for somatic and 0 for germline (disabled).
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_combine_phased_variants_distance

fields.label: vc combine phased variants distance snvs only
fields.doc:
Specifies the maximum distance over which phased SNVs will be combined into an MNV.
This option applies only to phased variant groups consisting of only SNVs.
The default is 2 for somatic and 0 for germline (disabled). For phased variant groups that include both SNVs and indels,
the analogous vc-combine-phased-variants-distance option applies.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_combine_phased_variants_distance_snvs_only

fields.label: vc combine phased variants max vaf delta
fields.doc:
Specifies the threshold for filtering MNV component variant calls when the events comprising to the MNV have
different allele frequencies. The default value is 0.1, which means that any SNV or INDEL with an AF that is
more than 0.1 greater than the MNV AF shall be emitted as a PASSing call, while the remaining components
shall be emitted with the 'mnv_component' FILTER flag. Only applicable when vc-combine-phased-variants-distance
is greater than 0 and vc-mnv-emit-component-calls is true. (Default=0.1)
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_combine_phased_variants_max_vaf_delta

fields.label: vc decoy contigs
fields.doc: Specifies the path to a comma-separated list of contigs to skip during variant calling.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_decoy_contigs

fields.label: vc depth annotation threshold
fields.doc: Filters all non-PASS somatic alt variants with a depth below this threshold. The default value is 0 (no filtering).
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_depth_annotation_threshold

fields.label: vc depth filter threshold
fields.doc: Filters all somatic variants (alt or homref) with a depth below this threshold. The default value is 0 (no filtering).
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_depth_filter_threshold

fields.label: vc emit ref confidence
fields.doc: Enables base pair resolution gVCF generation or banded gVCF generation.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_emit_ref_confidence

fields.label: vc emit zero coverage intervals
fields.doc:
Specifies whether or not to emit zero coverage intervals in the VCF output.
The default value is true
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_emit_zero_coverage_intervals

fields.label: vc max alternate alleles
fields.doc: Specifies the maximum number of alternate alleles to emit in the VCF output.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_max_alternate_alleles

fields.label: vc mnv emit component calls
fields.doc:
Specifies whether or not to emit the individual component variant records along with the merged variant records.
When set to true, all component calls making up an MNV or complex indel will be emitted in the VCF
along with the merged variant record. The default is true for somatic and false (disabled) for germline.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vc_mnv_emit_component_calls

fields.label: vd eh vcf
fields.doc: Inputs the ExpansionHunter VCF file for variant deduplication. The input file can be gzipped.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vd_eh_vcf

fields.label: vd output match log
fields.doc: Outputs a file that describes the variants that matched during deduplication. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vd_output_match_log

fields.label: vd small variant vcf
fields.doc: Inputs small variant VCF file for variant deduplication. The input file can be gzipped.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vd_small_variant_vcf

fields.label: vd sv vcf
fields.doc: Inputs structural variant VCF for variant deduplication. The input file can be gzipped.
fields.name: #dragen-snv-variant-caller-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-snv-variant-caller-options/vd_sv_vcf

inputs.label: alignment options input
inputs.doc: Alignment options or null

fields.label: aligner
fields.doc: Specifies any options under the [Aligner] configuration section
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/aligner

fields.label: append read index to name
fields.doc: By default, DRAGEN names both mate ends of pairs the same. When set to true, DRAGEN appends /1 and /2 to the two ends.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/append_read_index_to_name

fields.doc: Enables the deterministic sort of output alignment records. The default value is true.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/enable_deterministic_sort

fields.label: enable down sampler
fields.doc: Enables the down-sampling of input reads. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/enable_down_sampler

fields.doc: Enables the flagging of duplicate output alignment records.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/enable_duplicate_marking

fields.label: enable sampling
fields.doc: Automatically detects paired-end parameters by running a sample through the mapper/aligner.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/enable_sampling

fields.label: fastq offset
fields.doc: Specifies the FASTQ offset to use for the input FASTQ files. The default value is 33.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/fastq_offset

fields.label: filter flags from output
fields.doc: Filters output alignments with any bits set in val present in the flags field. Hex and decimal values accepted.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/filter_flags_from_output

fields.label: generate md tags
fields.doc: Generates MD tags with alignment output records. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/generate_md_tags

fields.label: generate sa tags
fields.doc: Generates SA:Z tags for records that have chimeric or supplemental alignments.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/generate_sa_tags

fields.label: generate zs tags
fields.doc: Generate ZS tags for alignment output records. The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/generate_zs_tags

fields.label: input qname suffix delimiter
fields.doc: Controls the delimiter used for append-read-index-to-name and for detecting matching pair names with BAM input.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/input_qname_suffix_delimiter

fields.label: mapper
fields.doc: Specifies any options under the [Mapper] configuration section
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/mapper

fields.label: output format
fields.doc:
Sets the format of the output file from the map/align stage.
The following values are valid:
  * SAM
  * BAM
  * CRAM
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/output_format

fields.label: preserve bqsr tags
fields.doc: Determines whether to preserve BI and BD flags from the input BAM file, which can cause problems with hard clipping.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/preserve_bqsr_tags

fields.label: preserve map align order
fields.doc: Produces output file that preserves original order of reads in the input file.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/preserve_map_align_order

fields.label: qc coverage
fields.doc: Up to three regions can be specified for coverage region reports.

fields.label: region
fields.doc: Generate the coverage region report using this bed file
fields.name: #dragen-qc-coverage__1.0.0.yaml/dragen-qc-coverage/region

fields.label: report type
fields.doc: Describe the report type requested for qc covreage region
fields.name: #dragen-qc-coverage__1.0.0.yaml/dragen-qc-coverage/report_type

fields.label: thresholds
fields.doc: Declare the thresholds to use in coverage report, up to 11 values
fields.name: #dragen-qc-coverage__1.0.0.yaml/dragen-qc-coverage/thresholds
#dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/qc_coverage

fields.label: ref sequence filter
fields.doc: Outputs only reads mapping to the reference sequence.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/ref_sequence_filter

fields.label: remove duplicates
fields.doc: If true, the option removes duplicate alignment records instead of only flagging them.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/remove_duplicates

fields.label: rna ann sj min len
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/rna_ann_sj_min_len

fields.label: rna library type
fields.doc:
Specifies the type of RNA-seq library. The following are the available values:
IU - Paired-end unstranded library.
ISR - Paired-end stranded library in which read2 matches the transcript strand (eg, Illumina Stranded Total RNA Prep).
ISF - Paired-end stranded library in which read1 matches the transcript strand.
U - Single-end unstranded library.
SR - Single-end stranded library in which reads are in reverse orientation to the transcript strand (eg, Illumina Stranded Total RNA Prep).
SF - Single-end stranded library in which reads match the transcript strand.
A -  DRAGEN examines the first reads pairs in the data set to automatically detect the correct library type. For polya tail trimming, the library type is assumed to be unstranded. Autodetect is the default value.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/rna_library_type

fields.label: rna mapq unique
fields.doc:
Some downstream tools, such as Cufflinks, expect the MAPQ value to be a unique value
for all uniquely mapped reads.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/rna_mapq_unique

fields.label: rrna filter contigs
fields.doc:
Sets the name of the rRNA sequences to use for filtering.
If you do not specify a value, the default gl000220 is used for human genome alignments
with the reference autodetect feature.
gl000220 is an unplaced contig included in hg19 and hg38 genomes,
which include a full copy of the rRNA repeat.
For other genomes, you must include a rRNA decoy contig when creating a hash table.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/rrna_filter_contig

fields.label: rrna filter enable
fields.doc: Enables the removal of rRNA reads from the output alignment records.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/rrna_filter_enable

fields.label: sample size
fields.doc: Specifies number of reads to sample when enable-sampling is true.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/sample_size

fields.label: strip input qname suffixes
fields.doc: Determines whether to strip read-index suffixes (eg, /1 and /2) from input QNAMEs. If set to false, the option preserves entire name.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-alignment-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-alignment-options/strip_input_qname_suffixes

inputs.label: dragen wgts alignment options
inputs.doc: Alignment options or null

$graph.label: dragen-wgts-rna-variant-calling-step v(4.4.4)
$graph.doc:
Run one or more of:
  * RNA Gene Fusion
  * RNA Quantification
  * RNA Variant Calling
  * RNA Splice Variant
with the dragen 4.4.4 toolkit

listing.entry:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Fail on non-zero exit of subshell
set -euo pipefail

# Reset dragen
/opt/edico/bin/dragen_reset

# Create directories
mkdir --parents \\
  "$(get_ref_mount())" \\
  "$(get_intermediate_results_dir())" \\
  "$(inputs.dragen_options.output_directory)"

# untar ref data into scratch space
tar \\
  --directory "$(get_ref_mount())" \\
  --extract \\
  --file "$(inputs.dragen_options.ref_tar.path)"

# Check if ora reference is set
if [[ "$(is_not_null(inputs.dragen_options.ora_reference))" == "true" ]]; then
  mkdir --parents \\
    "$(get_ora_ref_mount())"
    tar \\
      --directory "$(get_ora_ref_mount())" \\
      --extract \\
      --file "$(get_attribute_from_optional_input(inputs.dragen_options.ora_reference, "path"))"
fi

# Copy over the config.toml file to the output directory too
cp "$(get_dragen_config_path())" "$(inputs.dragen_options.output_directory)/$(inputs.dragen_options.output_file_prefix).config.toml"

# Run dragen command and import options from cli
"$(get_dragen_bin_path())" "\${@}"

fields.doc: Specifies the annotation file. The annotation file is used to annotate the variants.

fields.label: rna gf blat pairs
fields.doc:
A tab separated file listing gene pairs that have a high level of similarity.
The first and second column are the gene names, and the third column is the e-score.
This list of gene pairs is used as a homology filter to reduce false positives.
For runs on human genome assemblies GRCH38 and hg19, DRAGEN automatically
applies a default file generated using Gencode Human Release 32 annotations for primary chromosomes
if no other file is specified using the command-line.
fields.name: #dragen-rna-gene-fusion-detection-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-rna-gene-fusion-detection-options/rna_gf_blast_pairs
#dragen-wgts-rna-options-variant-calling-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-rna-options-variant-calling-stage/gene_fusion_detection_options

fields.label: lic instance id location

fields.label: maf conversion options
fields.doc: Specifies the MAF conversion options

fields.label: enable maf output
fields.doc:
Enables Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) output.
The default value is false.
fields.name: #dragen-maf-conversion-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-maf-conversion-options/enable_maf_output

fields.label: maf transcript source
fields.doc:
Specifies desired transcript source for Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) output.
One of 'Refseq' or 'Ensembl'.

#dragen-wgts-rna-options-variant-calling-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-rna-options-variant-calling-stage/maf_conversion_options

fields.doc:

The default is false.
fields.name: #dragen-nirvana-annotation-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-nirvana-annotation-options/enable_variant_annotation

fields.label: variant annotation assembly
fields.doc:

fields.name: #dragen-nirvana-annotation-options__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-nirvana-annotation-options/variant_annotation_data

Specifies the tarball containing the reference hash table. If the reference is not already loaded into the DRAGEN card, the option automatically loads the reference.

outputs.doc:
The default configuration options for the DRAGEN pipeline.
This is a JSON object that contains the default values for all
the configuration options that can be set in the DRAGEN pipeline.
We use this to set the default values for the configuration, and then overwrite it with
other options we provide in the workflow and then write back to toml when running the dragen tool!

$graph.label: rename-rgsm-in-alignment-header v(1.0.0)

$graph.label: dragen-wgts-rna-pipeline v(4.4.4)
$graph.doc:
Dragen dragen-wgts-rna-pipeline v4.4.4

Performs the following steps:
  * If input is a bam file, reheader the bam file such that the rgsm value matches
    the output_prefix value. We can't do this inside the dragen container since it doesn't have the samtools binary installed.
    Instead we run a seperate step to reheader the bam file.
  * Run the dragen rna pipeline
  * Run multiqc on the outputs of the dragen rna pipeline

Inputs:
  This pipeline differs from our previous rna pipeline by instead grouping inputs.
  This makes overall workflow cwl file much smaller, and the workflow graphs much more readable.
  It also means appending input options is much easier since it involves updating just one schema yaml file,
    rather than the workflow inputs, workflow steps and the tool inputs.
  Most of the grunt work is done in the dragen tools typescript file to convert input options into a configuration file.

Outputs:
  The outputs are the same as the previous dragen-rna pipelines
  The outputs are:
    * Dragen rna output directory (always)
    * Multiqc output directory (always)

Specifies whether the sample is RNA or DNA. This option is used to determine the alignment algorithm to use.
If set to true, the sample is treated as RNA and the appropriate alignment algorithm is used.

fields.label: ora reference
fields.doc: The ora reference to use for decompression of fastq files.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage/ora_reference

fields.label: output directory
fields.doc: Specifies the output directory.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage/output_directory

fields.label: output file prefix
fields.doc: Outputs file name prefix to use for all files generated by the pipeline.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage/output_file_prefix

fields.label: ref tar
fields.doc:
Specifies the tarball containing the reference hash table. If the reference is not already loaded into the DRAGEN card, the option automatically loads the reference.
Note that the actual dragen command is '--ref-dir' but we first need to download and extract the tarball.
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage/ref_tar

fields.label: sequence data
fields.doc:
The sequence data to be aligned and called variants on.
This can either be a bam file, cram file or a list of fastq list row objects
fields.name: #dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage__4.4.4.yaml/dragen-wgts-options-alignment-stage/sequence_data

inputs.label: alignment options
inputs.doc:
The options to be used for alignment.
This is a JSON object that contains the options to be used for alignment.
This is passed to the Dragen alignment tool.

inputs.label: annotation file
inputs.doc:
The annotation file to be used for
gene expression quantification, splice variant calling, and gene fusion calling

inputs.label: gene expression quantification options
inputs.doc: The Gene Expression Quantification options for the rna gene expression quantification

inputs.label: gene fusion detection options
inputs.doc: The Gene Fusion Detection options for the rna gene fusion detection

inputs.label: license instance id location
inputs.doc:
Path to the lic instance id location,
default is '/opt/instance-identity',
but user can either provide an alternative location
in the docker image or provide their own file.

inputs.label: maf conversion options
inputs.doc:
The options to be used for maf conversion.
This is a JSON object that contains the options to be used for maf conversion.
This is passed to the variant calling pipeline, make sure to add 'enable_maf_output' to the maf conversion options
As it is not enabled by default.

inputs.label: nirvana annotation options
inputs.doc:
The options to be used for nirvana annotation.
This is a JSON object that contains the options to be used for nirvana annotation.
This is passed to the variant calling pipeline, make sure to add 'enable_variant_annotation' to the nirvana annotation options
As it is not enabled by default.

inputs.label: reference
inputs.doc:
The ora reference used to decompress the input fastq files,
required if any of the fastqs are ora-compressed

inputs.label: reference
inputs.doc: The reference genome to be used for alignment and variant calling.

inputs.label: sample name
inputs.doc:
The sample name to be used for alignment and variant calling.
This is used to name the output files

inputs.label: sequence data
inputs.doc:
The sequence data to be aligned and called variants on.
This can either be a bam file, cram file or a list of fastq list row objects

inputs.label: snv variant calling options
inputs.doc:
The options to be used for rna variant calling.
This is a JSON object that contains the options to be used for variant calling.
This is passed to the Dragen variant calling tool.

inputs.label: splice variant caller options
inputs.doc: The Splice Variant Caller options for the rna splice variant caller

steps.label: run variant calling stage
steps.doc: Run the variant calling stage on the RNA alignment data

steps.label: get default alignment options schema
steps.doc:
Get the default alignment options schema if the input is null
We need this before we accidentally filter out any relevant keys from the default configuration options

steps.label: get default dna-variant-calling options schema
steps.doc:
Get the default dna-variant-calling options schema if the input is null
We need this before we accidentally filter out any relevant keys from the default configuration options

steps.label: get dragen configuration options
steps.doc:
We first need to get the existing dragen configuration options under
/opt/edico/config/dragen-user-defaults.cfg (in toml format), and parse this in as JSON format.
We can then use this in all our dragen tools to 'merge'

steps.label: run multiqc
steps.doc: Run multiqc on the outputs of the alignment and variant calling stages

steps.label: run reheader sequence data step
steps.doc: If our sequence data files are bam / cram files, we will need to reheader them first before commencing the pipeline

outputs.doc: The outputs of the variant calling stage.

outputs.label: multiqc output directory
outputs.doc:
The outputs of the multiqc stage.
This contains the multiqc report and the multiqc config file.

inputs.label: aligner options
inputs.doc: Input file, of varying format depending on the command run

outputs.label: aligner options output
outputs.doc: Output file, of varying format depending on the command run

inputs.label: mapper options
inputs.doc: Mapping options
